statements: DELETE FROM meteorological_data WHERE id = 1 AND temperature > 25.0;
DELETE FROM meteorological_data WHERE humidity < 60.0 AND hydropower_generation > 500.0;
DELETE FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 30 AND humidity < 50;
DELETE FROM HydropowerGeneration WHERE actual_generation < 2000 AND generation_capacity > 5000;
DELETE FROM Location WHERE city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM Weather_Data WHERE location_id = 1 AND recorded_at < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM weather_data WHERE temperature < 10 AND humidity > 80;
